content.name: xenon_buff
content.description: Spawn Xenon fleet in xenon home sectors and refill xenon shipyards and wharfs so they can produce more ships. Spawn a Xenon invasion Fleet to target player assets and allow an on-demand challange.
content.author: Skullwarrior
